32824.affected_area: Sault Ste Marie (North of St. Mary's River)
live_updates: This issue has been resolved, Thank you for your patience.
Field technicians have begun restoring services in your area. We thank you for your continued patience as services are restored.

Field technicians are being dispatched to investigate the cause of the service outage.

32824.summary: Some customers North of St. Mary's River in Sault Ste Marie are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
32824.title: Jan 31 - Sault Ste Marie (North of St. Mary's River) | Service Outage (Resolved)
